name: Super Mario Plumber
description:
WELCOME TO THE NEW MARIO ADVENTURE!!!  Bowser has kidnapped Princess Peach, You must rescue her as soon as possible mario  !!! 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The game was created with inspiration from the original Super Mario Bros 1985 game. In creating it, my goal was to make a game as close to those original games as possible, with as many interesting and fun twists on those ideas within the original Super Mario Bros limitations. However, the game differs from the original version in many ways. Beautiful graphical assets have been added, new enemy animations, new enemies new obstacles and much more. Thanks to Nintendo for the music, sprites and sounds.

 |  WHAT THIS GAME HAS   | ========================== -  Conroller Available -  Comfortable Movement -  Beautiful Pixel Art - You Can Kiss Princess !!  -  9 Hurdles -  10 Orginal Enemy - High Score System - Secrect Rooms - High Level Of Difficulty - Orginal SoundTrack - Orginal Sound Effect - Mini Boss - Hard Challange Rooms - Main Boss Bowser =========================== Install instructions 1-   Un-zip the file. 2-   Open " Super Mario Plumber " 3-   Enjoy
